pages.title: Foxhound
pages.text: Foxhounds are fierce dog-like creatures that roam the Nether. They don't fear lava, and their bites will set you on fire. You can tame a Foxhound with Coal if you're feeling brave. It will then follow you every where as a loyal protector.

pages.name: Foxhound
pages.text: A tamed Foxhound will regularly sleep on hot blocks. If it is a Furnace, its rate of burning will be accelerated.
